name: JavaScript
about: JavaScript is the world's most popular programming language.JavaScript is the programming language of the Web.JavaScript is easy to learn.This tutorial will teach you JavaScript from basic to advanced.

name: Python
about: Python is a popular programming language.Python can be used on a server to create web applications.

name: Java
about: Java is a popular programming language.Java is used to develop mobile apps, web apps, desktop apps, games and much more.

name: PHP
about: PHP is a server scripting language, and a powerful tool for making dynamic and interactive Web pages.PHP is a widely-used, free, and efficient alternative to competitors such as Microsoft's ASP.

name: C
about: C is a general-purpose programming language, developed in 1972, and still quite popular.C is very powerful; it has been used to develop operating systems, databases, applications, etc.

name: C++
about: C++ is a popular programming language.C++ is used to create computer programs, and is one of the most used language in game development.
